trans-unit.source: Provides implicit <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> management for child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: 对子消息传递活动进行隐式 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> 管理。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> activity maintains an implicit <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle> that is only visible to child activities.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> 活动维护一个仅对子活动可见的隐式 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle>。

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A> property is set by the user, it will be used as the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> implicit handle.
trans-unit.target: 当用户设置 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith%2A> 属性时，它将用作 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> 隐式句柄。

trans-unit.source: In the case of nested <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>, children of the inner scope cannot access implicit handle of the outer scope.
trans-unit.target: 对于嵌套 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>，内部范围的子项无法访问外部范围的隐式句柄。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何创建一个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>。

trans-unit.source: This example creates a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> and adds a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> (among other activites).
trans-unit.target: 此示例创建一个 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> 并添加一个 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope>（并执行其他一些活动）。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> contains a <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence> that is composed of a <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> and <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> activity.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> 包含一个 <xref:System.Activities.Statements.Sequence>，后者由 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.Send> 和 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.ReceiveReply> 活动组成。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the activity’s execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置活动的执行逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The activity’s execution logic.
trans-unit.target: 活动的执行逻辑。

trans-unit.source: The activity’s metadata that encapsulates the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 活动的元数据，用于封装活动的自变量、变量、子活动和活动委托。

trans-unit.source: Builds and validates a description of the activity’s arguments, variables, child activities, and activity delegates.
trans-unit.target: 创建并验证活动的自变量、变量、子活动和活动委托的描述。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" /> used by the child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置子消息传递活动使用的 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationHandle" />。

trans-unit.source: The correlation handle used by the child messaging activities.
trans-unit.target: 子消息传递活动使用的相关句柄。

trans-unit.source: This property is read-only at runtime.
trans-unit.target: 此属性在运行时为只读。

trans-unit.source: If the value is set at runtime, an <xref:System.InvalidOperationException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: 如果在运行时设置值，则会引发 <xref:System.InvalidOperationException>。

trans-unit.source: The runtime uses the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A> for correlation if it is present, otherwise the **CorrelatesWith** property of the messaging activity will be used.
trans-unit.target: 运行时使用<xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationInitializer.CorrelationHandle%2A>关联不存在，否则如果**CorrelatesWith**将使用消息传递活动的属性。

trans-unit.source: If both are absent, the ambient handle provided by <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> or the workflow service is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果二者都不存在，则将使用 <xref:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope> 提供的环境句柄或工作流服务。

trans-unit.source: The current native activity execution context.
trans-unit.target: 当前本机活动的执行上下文。

trans-unit.source: Called by the workflow runtime to execute the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope" /> activity.
trans-unit.target: 由工作流运行时调用，用于执行 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope" /> 活动。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith" /> property should be serialized.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否应序列化 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith" /> 属性。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith" /> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果应当序列化 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.Activities.CorrelationScope.CorrelatesWith" /> 属性值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。
